channel.title: Need a few commands
channel.description: ok i need two commands i want a command where all i got to type is ::giveadmin and they get admin and another is ::givemod where they get mod annnnnnd also i need working ipban i used d d 3s and they can still log on a differnt acc but when they log off they get banned,,,,

item.title: Need a few commands
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("delect") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownage pk")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

item.title: Need a few commands
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

put this on ur command

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“owner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownage pk”)) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been given co-owner rights by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.sendMessage(“Please Note: This does not make you the legit co-owner.”);
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just gave “+command.substring(6)+” co-owner “);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+” either isn’t online or doesn’t exist”);
}
}

else if (command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownage pk”)) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been made Administrator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just made “+command.substring(6)+” Administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“delect”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownage pk”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if (command.startsWith(“modarator”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownage pk”)) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been made Moderator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
sendMessage(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Modarator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

and change ownage pk into ur name

Read full topic

item.title: Need a few commands
item.dc:creator: @H4xz0r H4xz0r
item.description:
@H4xz0r wrote:

Give admin:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOU'R NAME")) { String name = command.substring(9); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; PlayerHandler.kickNick = name; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now an Administrator."); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist."); } }

Give mod:

else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOU'R NAME")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; PlayerHandler.kickNick = name PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now a Moderator."); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist."); } }

Read full topic
